long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Here its called Splozzle Toss. Splozzle Toss is the same game version called 'Splozzy Toss'. Play a liquid war game that is different, fun and addictive. This is just the beginning and there is more to come. It is a simple and easy game to play which is not complicated to play for everybody. Controls are simple and easy where you can just use a trackpad or a mouse. Sploosh Pool is the android version available on the play store. If interested have a look. Its not fully completed so in the next week or so I am going to make the game free for a small while. Just have look at 'Sploosh Pool' because that version is made for touch screen devices.
